article_title: 400 deaths expected during 4th of July holiday travel
article_text:
KAKE News On Your Side: Tips For Dealing With Drunk Drivers

Stay far away from the suspected vehicle.

Do not pass the vehicle or try to get the driver to pull over.

Remeber the license plate nuimber and vehicle make, model and color.

Call 911. Be sure to give a good locations of the vehicle.

article_metadata.description: The Fourth of July falls on a Saturday this year, which has driving experts worried about more drunk drivers on the road
article_metadata.author: Bryan Ramsdale, ABC News
